short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mocks data by mimicking request body payload from Swagger UI textarea, then reinserts it

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
üöÄ Instant Mock Data Generation for Swagger API

Swagger MockMagic is a simple solution for seamless mock data generation directly from your Swagger UI. With just a simple click, you can instantly generate mock data, eliminating the need for time-consuming manual input.

üéØ Point and Shoot Simplicity

There's no complex configuration that you have to remember! Swagger MockMagic follows a "point and shoot" philosophy, making mock data generation effortlessly simple. Just point to your request payload in the Swagger UI and choose to generate mock payload with ease.

üì¶ Eliminate Source Code Changes

Adding payload examples in your source code is tiresome. By replicating existing request payloads, it eliminates the need for source code changes. Saves time and streamline your development process without compromising on data accuracy.

‚úâÔ∏è Request Custom Data Categories

We believe in customization! Swagger MockMagic regularly adds new data categories, ensuring you have a diverse range of options. Have a specific category in mind? You can request it too! The best part? Swagger MockMagic is free to use!
